titles.title: Small Business Drought Relief Act
To amend the Small Business Act to include drought in the definition of disaster for purposes of the disaster loan program administered by the Small Business Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Introduced. Small Business Drought Relief Act - Amends the Small Business Act to include drought within its definition of disaster (thus qualifying small businesses suffering economic harm from droughts for assistance under such Act).
